doc.title: 40 Seconds
doc.plot: 40 Seconds begins with Katie who returns home and meets the mysterious yet charming Max, a man with a secret curse, disguised as a gift, wrapped around his wrist. This gift sees 40 seconds into the future, revealing your fate, with sometimes very funny and sometimes very tragic consequences. Add two lovely teenage girls terrorizing neighborhood streets, and you've got a fast paced film spiced with just the right mix of street racing, drama, humor, mystery, romance, all ending in one explosive twist of fate.
